text: Illa Tansuruhu Faqad Nasarahu Allahu 'Idh 'Akhrajahu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Thaniya Athnayni 'Idh Huma Fi Al-Ghari 'Idh Yaqulu Lisahibihi La Tahzan 'Inna Allaha Ma`ana Fa'anzala Allahu Sakinatahu `Alayhi Wa 'Ayyadahu Bijunudin Lam Tarawha Wa Ja`ala Kalimata Al-Ladhina Kafaru As-Sufla Wa Kalimatu Allahi Hiya Al-`Ulya Wa Allahu `Azizun Hakimun
